body_html: I've run into the same problem exactly as described by floringogianu except w/ Ubuntu 16.04 and gcc 4.9. Also, i used the --override flag when installing cuda toolkit via the .run script, which may or may not be relevant. cifar10 runs fine.
body_text: I've run into the same problem exactly as described by floringogianu except w/ Ubuntu 16.04 and gcc 4.9. Also, i used the --override flag when installing cuda toolkit via the .run script, which may or may not be relevant. cifar10 runs fine.
body: I've run into the same problem exactly as described by floringogianu except w/ Ubuntu 16.04 and gcc 4.9. Also, i used the --override flag when installing cuda toolkit via the .run script, which may or may not be relevant. cifar10 runs fine.
